title: 85/178/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 February 1985 approving the first amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 21 February 1985
approving the first amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany
(Only the German text is authentic)
(85/178/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by the Federal Republic of Germany, is hereby approved.
The amendment of the plan referred to in Article 1 shall take effect on 1 June 1984.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 February 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
